DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective observational review severe envenomation treatment CroFab
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Evaluation CroFab - Efficacy Severe Envenomation
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study use previously collect retrospective observational data compare treatment outcome patient treat CroFab severe envenomation mild/moderate envenomation .
DOC.criteria: Must involve treatment human patient CroFab January 1 , 2002 December 31 , 2004 The record must contain ALL following : 1 . Clinical signs/symptoms prior first dose antivenom , 2 . Documentation ALL dose antivenom use treat patient , 3 . Indication whether initial control achieve antivenom . To include Efficacy Evaluable Population ( EEP ) current analysis , record must meet following criterion : Must contain enough information calculate severity score base 7point severity scale . All record include Safety Population current analysis . Any case identify meet inclusion criterion exclude , include case treat CroFab .
